website_summaries.verdict: This is the indoor grill for those of us who have always wanted to enjoy flawless burgers, chicken, and steak, but have never learned how to grill for themselves. Simply set the dial to match your meal, and it’ll be ready in under 10 minutes. Grilling doesn’t get any easier than this!
pros: Extra-large 110 square inch grill cooks multiple servings at once
cons: Although this indoor grill is a breeze to clean, it may be worth investing in a larger drip tray

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little grill!
customer_reviews.text: Used this grill for the first time today and loved it. It preheats in 5 minutes and (when lid is closed) cooks chicken within 5-8 minutes! I used it open this time, but it still only took about 12 minutes. It's very easy to use. Easy to clean as well since the plates come right off and can be put in the dishwasher. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L.roths

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick coating erodes quickly
customer_reviews.text: I've had the grill for nearly a year and it functions as good as any. I like the timer but it took a little while to get used to. The biggest complaint is that the non-stick coating started wearing off after about 4 months. It is acerbated by the heat not being even on the plates. So, one end gets more use than the other and the coating has worn off on half the bottom plate. The plates are easy to remove and clean that makes the condition bearable. Replacement plates are not available. I've ordered a Foreman grill with non-stick, removable plates that I hope will last better.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Shankel

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND FOR EVERYONE
customer_reviews.text: This machine has been indispensable in my home. It saw me through the teenage days of my children, and now supports my grandchildren! It cooks hot dogs, hamburgers, grilled cheeses, boneless chicken breasts, and steaks effortlessly and perfectly. The grill plates remove for ease of washing unlike other grill models. The turn dial timer is extremely helpful. There is a removable drip container for ease in cleaning as well. This product will last 2 lifetimes!
customer_reviews.author: CDHgirl

customer_reviews.title: king
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this grill and I'm wondering why so many people are having trouble cleaning it. Just follow directions, use cooking spray, preheat, cook, use cleaning tool before it completely cools down, let plates cool later. If additional cleaning is needed rinse under water, use towel and you're done..not rocket science!
customer_reviews.author: andre mcrae

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I've had this thing for a month and have used it a lot. I love it. It's great for 2 or 3 grilled hot dogs or sausages for a quick meal. The manual says 5 minutes for a hot dog, but I prefer 12 minutes with good grill marks. You have to let it warm up for 5 minutes before you put the food on. I put the gratings in the dishwasher on the top shelf, since there were complaints that the nonstick coating flaked off. So far no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Walter J Rymarczyk

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: VERY disappointed in this product. I have bought Hamilton Beach for years and this by far is the worse ever. After using it two times the non stick started flaking and peeling off. I have used it less than 10 times and will be throwing it away because the non stick is now peeling off in chunks. Wish there was a minus star for this one.
customer_reviews.author: rushing

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: I live alone and this is the perfect little grill. Fits two burger patties as shown in the picture. The non stick surface make it very easy to clean. Update: I've had it for about 18 months now and the non stick surface is pretty much failing now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace one that had been used so much it was needing to be replaced. This one is no longer the same size. It is too small. Instead of 4 large chicken breasts it barely cooks two. It also smells like it is going to burn up if it cooks any longer. It does not accommodate for thick slices. However, if you only want to cook one breast or two hamburger patties it is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: non-stick wears off very quickley.
customer_reviews.text: This grill is almost perfect . It has removable plates for easy cleaning, an automatic shutoff timer, and even folds our for open face grilling. I have bought three of them over the last several years. The too flaws that has made me quit buying them are these. The grill has been made smaller even thought the price has gone up, and the non-stick coating on the cooking plates wears off too quick. this last grill I bought in Jan of 2018 was unusable by June of 2018. If they would upgrade to ceramic coating then I would consider buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little grill
customer_reviews.text: This little grill works great. The removable plates are fantastic and clean up nice in the dishwasher. The grill cooks well and don't create too much smoke or steam. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Teflon coating wore out after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try this as a Foreman alternative. The sideways slanting plates with the built-in drip pan was attractive, as was the timer. Well, the sideways slanting plates are very hard to clean unless you thoroughly scrape the grooves before they cool. After 4 months of moderate use the teflon coating on the plates began to ware off. And last week, half of a burger stuck to the plates and remained there. I had to scrape it off with a spatula and reconstruct the burger on the bun. I sincerely expected more for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but grill quality is very bad
customer_reviews.text: The unit itself works very well. However, the non-stick coating on the grills is extremely poor quality. If you do wash this in a dishwasher, plan on replacing the grills every 6 months. If you wash them by hand, you may get 1 1/2 years before the non-stick coating bubbles up and peels off. After a couple months, the non-stick coating loses its effectiveness, so things begin sticking--which makes the coating more likely to peel as you try to clean it. I only use my grill about 1x each week, and I have already had to replace the grills once, and they are now almost unusable again--all within 2 1/2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Mart in Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Winter Grilling
customer_reviews.text: It is nice to go back to a grill that actually works it is simple and doesn't have 300 useless devices. The goal is to cook quality meat on a timer and that is exactly what it does. Please burn those other silly sandwich making machines and keep these in stock so I can purchase this again in the future. Love it!! Grilling Inside in the winter!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: I miss my old Hamilton Beach indoor grill. It had temp control and cooked 4 burgers. This one has no temperature settings and only cooks 2 or 3 burgers. But I like: It opens flat. Has a timer. Detachable grill surfaces are easy to soak and cleans much easier than my old one. Attractive enough to leave on counter top I'll get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fleetwood

customer_reviews.title: Grill with TIMER but badly designed.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the built-in timer but that does make up for poor design. Grills quikly lost there coating and food began sticking badly. The grease trough not desinged well and grease leaks out causing a mess on counter. Base Unit hard to clean. Handles on sides of grill shaped the same as grease trough, burnt myself a couple of times reaching for grease trough.
customer_reviews.author: James Luetger

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I got along without using one of these all this time the cleanup is practically nothing it works amazingly I would definitely recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nickey Duh

customer_reviews.title: makes it a hard clean instead of an easy clean. Had an older model for about five ...
customer_reviews.text: Ridges are to close together, makes it a hard clean instead of an easy clean. Had an older model for about five years, which was used almost daily. The ridges were wider apart so getting baked on grease was easy to remove. Looking for another grill that is really easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Leroy

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our camper for when the outdoor grill isn't an option due to weather and or campsite. Heats up quickly, not too smoky for our camper, easy clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: This thing has been AMAZING! We use it at least 3 times or ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to get rid of our outdoor grill when we moved into our new apartment. This thing has been AMAZING! We use it at least 3 times or more a week. Makes dinners quick and easy after a long day at work
customer_reviews.author: Kyla Means

customer_reviews.title: Great grill!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a worn out George Foreman greill. Not only is it better with removable grill plates, but it also has a timed cook mode. No longer do I throw a ham slice on and come back in 5 minutes to pick up a charred mess. I can set this for a two minute cook time. I love this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Washed it in the dish washer then used it last night. SUPER easy to clean and the chicken tasted great- easy use! Would gift again to another grill lover
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design, but poorly built.
customer_reviews.text: It is indeed easy to clean and versatile. It does everything it's advertised to do. The biggest issue we have is the non-stick coating started flaking after about 6 months (3-4 uses/wk) and had to be replaced. The plate latches seem rather flimsy and the drip tray doesn't actually attach to the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The grill
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill, it cooks your chicken breast, steaks, shrimp, and links well. They are very juicy when cooking on this grill. It was smaller than my first one and the buttons that pull the grill part off break over time but it's worth it. Much better than the George Forman grills because the juices in your meat stay in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: indoor grill
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Hamilton Beach Indoor grill. Replaced the first one due to a damaged cord. So each to wipe clean or run in top rack of dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Frances E. Faw

customer_reviews.title: Too small for our needs
customer_reviews.text: We returned this grill. It was much smaller than what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hake

customer_reviews.title: I love this grill
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill. Had it for many years in white-it still works but not pleasing to look at so I ordered this one in black. It's perfect for two people. Wish they made the exact same thing but larger. So much easier than any other way to grill and just as tasty.
customer_reviews.author: NH Teacher & Spouse

customer_reviews.title: Oh my!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, we use this all the time.. I keep it plugged in and ready to go.. Just me and my wonderful retired husband so it is just right.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, because the grids come out cooks evenly and its fast
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Although nothing replaces a nice outdoor grill
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a month ago and it has served me well so far. If you are in an apartment situation with no outdoor grills allowed, this is sufficient for 1 or 2 people to cook a meal for the day. Although nothing replaces a nice outdoor grill, this comes pretty close. I've been able to make anything from steaks to burgers to korean dishes such as kalbi and bulgolgi. Great for students or for those of us who haven't grown in to a house yet :) .
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: The size is no where close to the old model
customer_reviews.text: We have an older model which was fantastic, but now the plates have worn off and cannot get replacements, so we ordered this, it works great but they downsized it considerably. Very disappointed with the size, would not order it again! Huge letdown!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Knill

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: The main feature I was looking for in an indoor grill was the removable plates. I had to use a screwdriver to un-screw the plastic tabs that hold the plates in, and then the tabs broke. I had the older model of this grill for several years. Too bad this model isn't made as well.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: fat drains off as it cooks
customer_reviews.text: love it wife cooks fish.stakes.hambergers,brats ,texas toast ,bacon ,chicken breast, you name is all good
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: It helps my husband volunteer to "grill" our dinners.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is now an indoor griller. It is small but so well thought through. Thanks for this one!
customer_reviews.author: C. Bussell '76

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: We have had several of these grills going back to the white ones. They were originally a great product but has steadily gone down hill. They claim that the grills are "non-stick" but the last one we purchased is far from it. It has a shiny surface, which should have been our first clue. Everything we cook on it sticks and basically ruins the meat. Even oiling the grill before applying the meat to the grill does not solve the problem. It is a shame that a once, very good product is now a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse C. Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Buy this table top grill for small grilling needs!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product! This grill has a convenient drip pan for grease. It has removable grills that can be placed in the dishwasher! Clean up is easy. It makes super steaks, burgers, and other grilled foods. We like the preheat function! I would recommend this table top grill to anyone. We never put it away it. It works quickly and well.
customer_reviews.author: V. W.

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach 04009
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today but I cooked pork chops and asparagus tonight. I absolutely love this grill. Easy to use,clean, and store! Recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Irma Gray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little kitchen grill. Easy to clean with its detachable plates.
customer_reviews.author: Sly

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Plugged in and set timer to warm up and the light didn't come on and the grill never heated up. Doesn't have the second ground wire either only a two prong plug. My old one had the three prong safety ground.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Alrighty
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother trying to cook bacon on here. It takes forever and doesn't taste that great. Burgers do cook and taste well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item very many years ago and I finally needed a new one. There were some very nice improvements over the old one. This is one of the best out there.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Works just like my old one.
customer_reviews.text: It works like my old one that I wore out. Cleans even easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach products
customer_reviews.text: Had an HB before and love this one too. Especially like the timer knob. Great for making Reubens!
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works greater than the George foreman and not as costly
customer_reviews.author: reindeer57

customer_reviews.title: It works well and is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I've used mine a few times. It works well and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for Hamilton Beach
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Just fits 2 hamburgers. Side dray keeps falling out. Timer is useless AND printed time numbers rubbed off when washed! I had another Hamilton Beach that lasted for years. I'm ready to throw this one out after using it 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: PAT A

customer_reviews.title: A+++
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard to find one of these any more the has a timer on it. Being our kid like to cook and he does have some challenges the timer is a must. We had the old model of this and loved every year we had of it. Only hope more of the makers of these thing come back out with more timer type.
customer_reviews.author: Jwillard

customer_reviews.title: Works the same and cleans just as easily!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my last one that died (had it over 10 years). Works the same and cleans just as easily!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: size
customer_reviews.text: check the exact size you need and don't buy if the item doesn't have the size or it won't fit. Not sure whether to trust reviews. They told me this item was ran small. ???
customer_reviews.author: J Wilfon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill. Easy to clean, timer, cooks evenly! I may have to buy another one for a present.
customer_reviews.author: Allysmom

customer_reviews.title: Grilled reveiw
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I had a larger one before I thought this was larger I still like this product I m just disappointed because its smaller than I expected and the part that holds the top plate in broke after I used it just a few times but i waited so long to get this and you can't find it in stores so now I really need it cus I have to eat low fat n this helps take fats out . But I still like it better than the George Forman grills
customer_reviews.author: Julia eickmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk don't buy...... after the first one I buy stop in working in a month got a replacement stop working in 6 month
customer_reviews.author: Kody Armentrout

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sent back. The rack was was losing its coating. Other than that it did its job
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn D. Battle

customer_reviews.title: It is horrible. It does not turn off correctly
customer_reviews.text: It is horrible. It does not turn off correctly. I purchased for my mother as a gift and I was unable to return because 30 days had passed. Very disappointed in size, the way it works and the fact that I could not return when it stopped working properly after 35 day. Do not buy... it is a waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Zona H.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work just fine and it's nice to have the non-stick grills again
customer_reviews.text: It's a little smaller than the one I had before, but they don't carry the older model anymore" it's also not quite as 'heavy duty' as the old one. The grills are lighter, but the ridges are deeper. Seems to work just fine and it's nice to have the non-stick grills again.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Hated it.
customer_reviews.text: I only had this for maybe 3 months and the non stick stuff came off...I had an older Hamilton Beach and it lasted 3 years. I loved it...this new one I would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice and small, convenient and works great
customer_reviews.text: I like how you can open this small grill out flat and use both side. It's also nice and compact, heat up fast and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda S

customer_reviews.title: Good indoor Grill !
customer_reviews.text: Good indoor grill for the price. Very sturdy, easy to use and clean. The grill is good for one people use. For the price,can't complaints too much.
customer_reviews.author: nwklee

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy! Made cheaply, plastic drip tray won't stay in. Can't store it unless tape drip tray .. You "get what you pay for".
customer_reviews.author: G of DE

customer_reviews.title: I loved my old one
customer_reviews.text: I loved my old one. It still works after 10 plus years. This new unit is smaller but performs the same as my old one. I like the grill plates being removable so you can wash them.
customer_reviews.author: Marvy6

customer_reviews.title: Easy and safe
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to grill inside and have a timer that cuts off heat. Great safety feature.
customer_reviews.author: l evans

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this at all. The drip drawer keeps falling out and I get grease all over my counter. Some of the non stick topping has come off already. Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: its worthless
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like anything it burns everything it pain to clean etc. wouldn't take another one if it was free
customer_reviews.author: James Freeman

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: removable plates,easy to clean,just love it.--if youse alufoil then save even more time whit cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: maria szabo

customer_reviews.title: I have a Hamilton Beach like the one I ordered but it was bigger
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be biger. I have a Hamilton Beach like the one I ordered but it was bigger. It could cook three hamburgers.
customer_reviews.author: Ed O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Ready for some grilling
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I do not like about this grill is that the drain trap is too small
customer_reviews.author: Queen Troy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to clean and I really like the time function and flat open cooking options
customer_reviews.author: fast and fun

customer_reviews.title: They were perfect!
customer_reviews.text: First, the lower grid slants down to such a degree that food slides right off. Second, it takes FOREVER to heat up at the highest setting and even at that, it doesn't get especially hot (i.e., for steaks). Third, the grease catcher tray is not attached, doesn't slide into an internal compartment or anything. You just have to set it on the counter in front of the grill and hope its back far enough so the grease doesn't end up on the countertop. Overall, I would never buy this again. What happened to the original George Foreman grills?? They were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: VaBeachMomma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This grill is so easy to use and to do clean up afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Dobbins

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome griller. I especially love the removable plates for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome griller. I especially love the removable plates for easy cleaning. The spill tray removes easily as well. Everything I've cooked so far on this grill tastes great and not dry. Overall, worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tyneshia McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small enogh to cook 2tbones and 4 butgers does not take up much space
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: sent it to my son as he loved mine when visiting. we both use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like the one I had for 15yrs
customer_reviews.text: Just like the one I had for 15yrs! The grill grates are narrower and deeper which cooks better. Very easy clean up. The only problem I have is with the drip tray, it doesn't want to stay in the place for it. My other one did.
customer_reviews.author: sjb

customer_reviews.title: still a good item. I had an older one for several ...
customer_reviews.text: Basically, still a good item. I had an older one for several years and decided to get a replacement. The new grill plates were not made out of as heavy metal and did not hold the heat as well. It still did a good basic grill job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perform very well meat come off the grill ready to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Livers

customer_reviews.title: Cord too short
customer_reviews.text: I have had a hamilton beach indoor grill for years and loved it. The problem with this one is the cord is not long enough to reach and still have it where it would be out of the way. Cord is about 18 to 24 inches. Also when trying to clean it the tracks are closer together and I can't get my finger or cloth inside it to clean it thoughly. Very disappointed in this one.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Know broke right away.
customer_reviews.text: I bought and only used 4 times. the knob broke off because it is plastic. Contacted HB they said the only way to replace is to pay shipping for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy C.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: this grill is great for hamburgers, chicken breast or grilling anything. Clean up is a breeze, just pop the grill trays in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: teresa wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The non stick coating is cheap and the hinge broke after only a few months use.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach Grill
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill for its removable grills. The only reason I purchased a whole new grill is I could not find just the grills to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi

customer_reviews.title: Great grill!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I have found wrong with this grill is that it could be larger and it would work better for my family. We have used ours for several months and it has performed very well.
customer_reviews.author: Wally Gray

customer_reviews.title: Why ship it broken!
customer_reviews.text: shipped with leg not attached. Grill unsafe to use as is, as advertised. :(
customer_reviews.author: James R Ford

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the grill. Meat texture is always tender. Not easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Paradise

customer_reviews.title: I like this "new" H B Grill even better than the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this "new" H B Grill even better than the old one we had! It is so much easier to clean as it comes apart! I am using it quite often even for grilled sandwiches! Thank you, H B and Amazon for the amazing price we paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Newberg

customer_reviews.title: Good recommendation but...
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to do some grilling indoors since I can't do it outside. First time using this product and a plastic part that holds the top grill melted. Do not recommend this item. George Foreman's indoors grills are better and cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: mmeaux

customer_reviews.title: We love this grill it is the second one we have ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this grill it is the second one we have had, the first one we had for about 7 years. This is great for two people and you don't have to worry about all the fat in you food.
customer_reviews.author: Denise DeForge

customer_reviews.title: I was looking vor a Model 25335 Mode land had ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking vor a Model 25335 Mode land had to settle for this smaller unit.It just isnt exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Robert  Slusher

customer_reviews.title: Good to clean
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to make this purchase since the plates are removable. Good to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bet

customer_reviews.title: It was not the like original one
customer_reviews.text: It was not the like original one , that I had for the last 7 years.& I thought will be the same. But No. AMAZON sent me the new version. ( Shame of AMAZOM ). You should have studied this product, before putting online for selling. - Hamilton Beach Grill is a ( B.S. ) made in.( WHEREEVER ). The meat / chicken sticks & burn to upper & bottom trays. Believe me. Very hard to clean the trays after cooking. Especially, when time to eat. ( need to eat hot food )! *** the new version, is not worth it. ( Not 5 Cents ). Unlucky me, can't return it.. Good to Recycle
customer_reviews.author: Samir

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach Easy-Clean
customer_reviews.text: The Hamilton Beach Indoor Grill is one of my favorite small appliances, in fact I prepare most all of my meats on the grill, using the appliances at least three or four times per week. It is perfect for a quick meal for people with busy schedules. I also own the larger grill made by Hamilton Beach; I would highly recommend the product, as it is a necessary appliance in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: peace

customer_reviews.title: GREAT INSIDE GRILLER
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought I really love it. Haven't used the new one yet, still got a little life on the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to my Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: East to use, clean, and cooks fast! Great for grilling veges too! Love the stay on feature on the dial too.
customer_reviews.author: tm

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: Small but excellent size for 2. EASY CLEAN UP. Pretty clear directions. Fast. Good meat guide lines. Does not take up a lot of counter space.
customer_reviews.author: cornelia aiston

customer_reviews.title: BIGGER IS BETTER!
customer_reviews.text: Got one of these about 2 weeks ago. Not really impressed with it. Easy-Clean is in the mind of the manufacturer. It would be easy clean of the grill had equal distance between ridges. However, the first and last ridge is to small for the little cleaner to fit so you end up with 2 little groves that are a pain to clean. Several years ago I had the big brother of this grill and really liked it for its size. This is more for a family of 1 or 2 max. Bottom line ITS JUST TO SMALL.
customer_reviews.author: Tommygun

customer_reviews.title: I do not like the fact that it gets totally hot
customer_reviews.text: First, the drip container melted. It was quickly replaced. Secondly, I do not like the fact that it gets totally hot; but I guest it would since it will open flat. Thirdly, the plates are a little loose. I had a Hamilton Beach Indoor grill before for years and I loved it. I know today everything is made of plastic and not as sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product, cooks very well & cleans up in a snap
customer_reviews.author: kevin teeter

customer_reviews.title: trays
customer_reviews.text: seems flimsy, drip tray could be more secure in position, drip grooves in bottom tray are too deep and narrow for easy cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Rowland

customer_reviews.title: ... had hoped it might be but it has worked great so far
customer_reviews.text: It was not as big as I had hoped it might be but it has worked great so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hall

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's not like the ones I had in the past. But guess I can't do anything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: NEED BUILT TO LAST
customer_reviews.text: Not very durable top lid already broke didn't have it a good month yet other than that it's exceptionally well for what I need on a everyday bases.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Williams

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was OK I thought it would cook a little bit better
customer_reviews.author: Jaison Rodgers

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Electric Indoor Grill with Easy Clean Nonstick Removable Plates, 110 Square Inch Cooking Surface (25332)
product_meta.description: With 110" Of grilling space, The Hamilton Beach, easy to clean, indoor grill can handle all of your grilling needs.
feature_bullets: Nonstick surface opens flat to a 110 square inch grill
Cooks most meals in 10 minutes or less
